title: Howard Beck and Lloyd Pierce
description:
Zach and Howard Beck discuss the Russell Westbrook-John Wall trade and the Lakers' stars re-upping, then Atlanta coach Lloyd Pierce comes on to talk about the team's work registering Georgia voters in this election cycle -- plus the new-look Hawks.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
